categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith actors

nodes.text: Nash Edgerton (born January 19, 1973) was, during the filming of the prequel trilogy, a stunt double for Ewan McGregor (Obi-Wan Kenobi).
Edgerton is the brother of Joel Edgerton (Owen Lars). By coincidence, Obi-Wan and Owen were referred to as brothers in the Return of the Jedi novelization.

Nash has also directed numerous short films and television episodes, as well as two feature-length films, The Square (2008, co-starring and co-written by Joel), and the action/comedy Gringo, starring Joel and David Oyelowo.
